attributes.action: Stop the sale of and marketing of ouija boards to children as toys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are against the sale of Ouija Boards as toys for children. We believe that they are a stepping stone to the occult for inquisitive children. The occult is highly dangerous and is not a game.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
